examples.example: 经过多年努力，他终于拥有了百万资产，过上了幸福的生活。

translate.english: After years of hard work, he finally owned millions of assets and lived a happy life.

examples.example: 这位年轻的企业家凭借自己的智慧和努力，在短短几年内就积累了百万财富。

translate.english: This young entrepreneur, with his wisdom and efforts, has accumulated millions of wealth in just a few years.

examples.example: 我相信只要通过不懈的努力，未来我也有可能拥有百万的财富。

translate.english: I believe that as long as I make unremitting efforts, I may also have millions of wealth in the future.
